message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the quality of the product but also the value it can bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking for a more reasonable price. Would you consider offering the product for $8000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still valuing the quality and uniqueness of our product, I am proposing an adjusted price of $9500. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value we place on the product and your budget.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $7500 for the product.

I appreciate your feedback and your desire to stay within your budget, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $8500. This price allows us to maintain a fair valuation for the product while providing you with the opportunity to acquire it at a price that respects your financial considerations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $7800 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're able to communicate effectively. Considering your proposal and aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement, I am now offering the product to you for $8200. This price reflects a compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $7900 for the product.

I appreciate your continued engagement, Bob. After reviewing your latest offer, I am pleased to offer the product to you for $8100. This price aims to provide a fair valuation for the product while accommodating your financial constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair price. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $7950 for the product.
